name: Donovan - The Hazard Duck
description:
You are playing as Donovan, the last of the hazard ducks, a species of feared warriors that fought in a war against the mutant duck larvae that hatch inside of the belly of Space Whales!

You are on a misssion to finish the war once and for all...

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Space - Dodge
Left Mouse Button - Fire
